unnormalised: Crop insurance is vital for farmers in states like Maharashtra facing unpredictable monsoons. Dr. Patil's research at ICAR shows yield losses can be significant. The Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) needs wider adoption. Claim disbursement delays, often taking months, need addressing. A farmer with 500 sq ft in Vidarbha lost Rs. 20,000 last year due to unseasonal rain. Simplifying the process will encourage more participation. Transparency is key.
